name: Orka Technology Group
description: Orka Technology Group is an innovative company focused on developing smart and sustainable solutions for the energy sector. Founded in 2014, Orka specializes in creating advanced technologies that optimize energy consumption and improve efficiency across various industries. With a commitment to sustainability, Orka aims to revolutionize the way energy is utilized, providing smart grid solutions and energy management systems that help businesses reduce their carbon footprint. The company is particularly known for its cutting-edge software platforms, which enable real-time monitoring and data analytics to maximize energy efficiency. Orka's solutions cater to a wide range of sectors, including manufacturing, commercial real estate, and utilities, helping clients transition to more sustainable energy practices. The company's mission is to empower businesses with the tools and insights needed to make informed energy decisions, ultimately contributing to a greener future. With a team of experts in energy management and technology, Orka continues to push the boundaries of innovation in the energy landscape.

faq.answer: Orka is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

faq.answer: Orka offers smart grid software, energy analytics platforms, carbon footprint trackers, and energy efficiency reports.
